formattedAddress: 28 Greenwich Ave, New York, NY 10011, USA
adrFormatAddress: 28 Greenwich Ave, New York, NY 10011, USA

originalText.text:
Every time we dine at Oak Truffle Tuscan Lounge, Rudy makes us feel like we are dining with family. We have felt like we’ve known him for a lifetime - he is genuine and makes you feel so welcome like we were are talking to a friend. Such a warm, friendly vibe and atmosphere, it has easily become one of our favorite NYC restaurants!

If you’re looking for an intimate dining experience, best staff and out of this world food, you have to run here! We are blown away by the flavor and detail put into every bite. The wine pairings and truffle are just the cherry on top and they do not skimp on the truffle!!! We absolutely love this place and recommend to anyone visiting NYC or even local.

You can tell Rudy and his wife love their restaurant, it’s their baby and their treat their customers like guests in their own home and of course the quality of the food and dishes are incredible! 10/10 would highly recommend to anyone.

originalText.text: If you love truffle, you HAVE to check out this spot. Food and cocktails were divine and the owners are the friendliest and warmest people. I didn’t think truffles would go with an espresso martini, but was pleasantly surprised - one of the best cocktails I’ve ever had! A little on the pricier side, but truffles ain’t cheap and you get what you pay for. Can’t wait to go back!

originalText.text: I can't say enough great things about this adorable little place. The attention to detail, service, drinks, and food were all out of this world. If you enjoy truffles, this is a little slice of heaven. It has limited seating, so book a reservation if you can.

text.text: I can't say enough great things about this adorable little place. The attention to detail, service, drinks, and food were all out of this world. If you enjoy truffles, this is a little slice of heaven. It has limited seating, so book a reservation if you can.

originalText.text:
I love truffle anything so when my best friend and I drove by this small intimate restaurant, we were intrigued!
Truffle can be added to anything here and we added it to all of our dishes. It did not disappoint.
We had the Caesar salad, truffle burrata, and truffle espresso martinis!! She ordered the rigatoni truffle ragu and I ordered the truffle cacio e Pepe. For dessert we shared the pistachio truffle tiramisu—wow. Chef’s kiss!
The owner, Rudy, and staff are amazing! So hospitable, friendly and very kind. So happy that we bumped into this and really enjoyed it.
We will definitely be coming back!

originalText.text: One of the absolute best restaurant experiences I have had so far. The owners treat you with such love and care. Highly recommended! You will love every second you spend here. Absolutely amazing food and the touch of truffle to every dish is such an interesting spin.
